mapper.insert: INSERT INTO none_trade_post(none_trade_post_no, title, content, regdate, id, category_no, board_type_no) VALUES(none_trade_post_seq.nextval,#{title},#{content},sysdate,#{memberVO.id},#{categoryNo},#{boardTypeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT none_trade_post_no, title, content, regdate, id FROM (SELECT n.none_trade_post_no, n.title, n.content, to_char(n.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')as regdate, b.id, row_number() over(ORDER BY n.none_trade_post_no DESC) AS rnum FROM none_trade_post n, bay_member b WHERE n.id=b.id) WHERE rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}
